content:
It was brought to my attention that we don't have any unrestricted Discord channel for all Lean users.
Let me invite you to my new Discord server Lean 4 anarchy!
We allow all the tea, memes, unofficial logos, swearing, ... anything you foo king want!
This link should work forever: https://discord.gg/WZ9bs9UCvx
Feel free to share the invite link with any Lean users!
Isn't this channel public. The link will be accessible to anyone and everyone online, including all sorts of spammers

If we get spambots, we will kick them out.
If we get too much spam from some users, we will direct them to respective channels.

There is also a general Functional Programming discord with a fairly active #lean channel. It is useful for getting perspectives from other proof formalizers and dependently typed languages. I think this is how you can get there: https://discord.gg/FUKKjpzq
